alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Custer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 6:21PM CDT until July 26 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Custer County in central Nebraska... Southeastern Blaine County in north central Nebraska... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 620 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Anselmo, or 14 miles south of Brewster, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Milburn, Milburn Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area and Linscott. This includes Highway 2 between mile markers 247 and 257. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
